name: nfan1
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wnf(s0, wa(w0, w1))

-| wnf(s0, wn(wi(w0, wn(w1))))

body.origin:

comment: A closed form of ~ nfan . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.) ~ df-nf changed. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 18-Sep-2021.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 7-Jul-2022.)
